data.text:
I remember visiting QARGOS's Pune facility in November 2022 with Suchit Jain and meeting up with Alok Das Pranav Shinde and their talented team. The atmosphere in their design space was electrifying. You could feel that the team was focused and committed to a mission - To Advance the World's Transition to Sustainable Logistics. Of course, they are one of the 20,000 startups that are part of our SOLIDWORKS for Startups program and are using the power of the #3DEXPERIENCEplatform. Special thanks to the world-class mentoring by Srikrishna Srinivasa Chittur, Go-To-Market Leader: 3DEXPERIENCEWorks Simulation Portfolio. You have a Winner here, and we are so proud of you, Team Qargos!! To know more about QARGOS, visit: https://lnkd.in/e9uB_sBz If you are a hardware startup building or hoping to build a physical product with an aim to sell in the market, Apply to the SOLIDWORKS for Startups program: https://lnkd.in/ejvXVvNx Suchit Jain Frederic Vacher Philippe LAUFER Victoire de Margerie Gian Paolo Bassi Florence Verzelen John Kitchingman Deepak N G P M Ravikumar Ramakrishnan Venkataraman Kishor Sarvade Praveen CharlesMikkel Marott - I ‚ù§Ô∏èüöÄüí°Rollin WillisAxel Erraoui https://lnkd.in/eWvkEhHB

The Wait is Over!! K-Startup Grand Challenge 2024 is here. If you are, or know of, a startup that wants to expand their footprint in to Asia, this challenge is just the right opportunity for them. Having met hundreds of K-startups, accelerators, CVCs, and investors in the past year at #CES and during my visit to Seoul last year, thanks to Korean Ministry of SMEs and Startups and PEN Ventures team - MYOUNG SOO SONG NaEun Christine Kim HyeJin Lee Eunhye Jo, I know for sure that South Korea is the place to be for startups. The quality of resources, mentorship, networking opportunities, and inspiration per square inch that you get there as a startup is unparalleled! Dassault Syst√®mes 3DEXPERIENCE Lab and SOLIDWORKS for Startups program love working with K-startups and want to wish all the candidates of K-Startup Grand Challenge the very best of luck! To know more about the SOLIDWORKS for Startups program, visit https://lnkd.in/ejvXVvNx If you are a startup working on a tough technical challenge for a better, sustainable world, Apply to the 3DEXPERIENCE Lab at www.3dexperiencelab.com #startups #tech #impact Frederic Vacher Suchit Jain Philippe LAUFER John Kitchingman Gian Paolo Bassi Manish Kumar Florence Verzelen Victoire de Margerie Tom Acland Woonsung Jung Jaein Bae Wonik Lee HWAJUNG KIM Stephane Sireau JeeMin Jeong Minyoung Yeo EunSun Chung JangHyuk Lee Franck Mahon Vishal SHARMA HoSang LEE Rekha Kamat Sean Farrell Jillian Friot Weronika Spiewak Suhaspritipal G Fabien Bartel Filip Kuttner Hyunsoo Cho Nemesisa Ujjain Jay Kim ARAM HAN Dan Wagner

At SOLIDWORKS, we love startups!! It‚Äôs always humbling to bump into startup founders who joined the SOLIDWORKS for Startups program a few years ago and are now well on their way to launching their innovations in the market successfully. In the words of one founder I met at TechCrunch Disrupt last year, ‚ÄúWhen we started out 4 years ago, all we had was- a napkin sketch, sleepless nights, no money, and a SOLIDWORKS model that we would pan, zoom, rotate ad infinitum as we ran optimization cycles on it‚Äù. It‚Äôs powerful! We started the SOLIDWORKS for Startups program 7 years ago in the spirit of ‚Äògivefirst‚Äô and continue to provide access to over $100,000 worth of Design, Engineering and Simulation software FREE for the first year, at 70% and 50% off for the subsequent years. Thanks to all of you who have helped shape this program that has accelerated journeys of over 20,000 hardware startups. Couldn‚Äôt have been possible without the help of: Inspiring Leaders - Philippe LAUFER John Kitchingman Gian Paolo Bassi Suchit Jain Frederic Vacher Florence Verzelen Ramakrishnan Venkataraman P M Ravikumar Sudarshan Mogasale Benjamin Tan William Ma CK Goh Jaein Bae Tom Acland Simge Akarsu Walsh Jennifer Thomas Kristen Wilson (Syrek) Filip Kuttner Srikrishna Srinivasa Chittur A hard-working team - Rollin Willis Axel Erraoui Praveen Charles Mikkel Marott - I ‚ù§Ô∏èüöÄüí° 3DEXPERIENCE Lab team - Jillian Friot Sean Farrell Fabien Bartel Suhaspritipal G Our Partners - Greentown Labs MassRobotics T-Works PEN Ventures Rev: Ithaca Startup Works mHUB HAX HCVC and 200+ accelerators/incubators Gl√ºxkind | Techstars '23 Linas Gela≈æanskas

As the 24 of us complete our year-long journey of Dassault Syst√®mes Go Lead Our TomorroW (GLOW) Leadership program with INSEAD, it brings me great joy in thanking these seven sets of leaders without whom this pursuit could not have been possible. John Kitchingman Gian Paolo Bassi Suchit Jain Frederic Vacher Victoire de Margerie from SOLIDWORKS and 3DEXPERIENCE Lab for their trust in me and for nominating me for the program. Florence Verzelen Laurence Barth√®s for their executive vision and energy behind the GLOW program, with exemplary support from Auriane Joudiou Fabienne COURTEIX Executive Jury - Florence Verzelen Erik Swedberg Florence HU-AUBIGNY Philippe LAUFER Laurence Barthes for awarding our team‚Äôs Action Learning Project (ALP) the coveted LEADERSHIP MINDSET AWARD. I know it was a tough choice as all the teams had compelling presentations. Our Professors at INSEAD - Chengyi Lin (specially you- for your inspiration, energy and perspectives on Leadership) Dr Franklin Vrede Li Huang Antonio Fatas Veronique Doux Tom Acland - our project sponsor, for his indomitable trust and patience as our core team navigated the labyrinthe of online touchpoints engineering to synthesize our final direction. C√©line CHEDRU GUIGAN for her unwavering patience, positivity and commitment as our GLOW deputee :) And of course, Oumaima K. Marc Truffault Chris Clark David Gadarian for being co-passengers, drivers, navigators and sometimes ticket checkers on this amazing journey. The fact that at one point we actually fell deeply in love with our project made all the difference I think. Together we did Glow! Thanks for being the hurdler, the anthropologist, the cross pollinator and the set designer for the project!! Special thanks to Patrick JOHNSON Manish Kumar Fran√ßois-R√©gis Chaumartin Kurt Chen and Vincent Liu for your guidance and time! And to the entire cohort of GLOW 2024. Thanks for being part of the extended family and for the fun times we had at Fontainebleu. Of course, to my family - Poonam Dhiman and my two guinea pigs (Cookie and Candy) whom I disturbed at 3am twice a week for past few months as I worked on our project and bumped into furniture trying to reach for the lights. You can sleep well now :) And yes, my team, for your constant support! - Personally, it felt like I completed a full circle here. 9 years ago as I was packing my bags to come to the beautiful #Cornell campus for my MBA, I stumbled upon an INSEAD info booklet. I didnt end up applying but I distinctly remember saying to myself ‚ÄúMaybe Next Time!‚Äù Thanks Dassault Systemes for helping me manifest that fleeting thought! And finally, I have the answer to the question I asked Chengyi Lin on Day 1 of the program. Yes, Leadership can be FUN! Lourdes Casanova Soumitra Dutta Sara Dutta #WeAre3DS #WeAreGLOWERS

Ok I was waiting.. waiting to return to Boston and see if the magic of #3dexperienceworld2024 would wear off or if the crazy schedule - helping with presentations, maker zone, startup zone, meetings,..would wear me down. Well neither did, and I came whistling to office at 8am today again..as my friend Katerina Miklos (Pichugina) said ‚ÄúI actually feel refreshed by the 3DEXPERIENCE World‚Äù. So true! This 3DEXPERIENCE World was different somehow!! It had this element of ‚Äúdense thrill‚Äù sprinkled with the indomitable spirit of #community that‚Äôs so palpable when you are part of the large SOLIDWORKS and the larger Dassault Syst√®mes family. Special thanks to - Chinloo Lama Sal Lama for making my life so easy by championing the Makers Zone this year - Jillian Friot Rollin Willis Axel Erraoui for bringing the power of startups from 3DEXPERIENCE Lab and the SOLIDWORKS for Startups program to the playground - Sean Farrell for plugging all the gaps and lending his yeoman‚Äôs service to the Lab and the event! Of course, thanks to Suchit Jain Gian Paolo Bassi John Kitchingman Frederic Vacher Manish Kumar for trusting the team with bringing Lab and startup program stories to the Mainstage and the Playground!! We promise - Houston will be bigger and better!! #Inspiration #Innovation #Community # Philippe LAUFER Florence Verzelen Elisa P. Victoire de Margerie Valerie Ferret Jennifer Thomas Murielle Martin Auriane Joudiou Bernard Charl√®s Suzanne Locke Simge Akarsu Walsh Marie Planchard Tony Tsao Eli Mather Kristen Wilson (Syrek) Rich Sturchio Kevin Huang Abhijit Bansod Torrey Smith Thomas Froger Silva Linas Gela≈æanskas Rob Coker Ian Roy Brent Bushnell Tom Acland

Join SOLIDWORKS for Startups program, 3DEXPERIENCE Lab and Dell Technologies for Startups program, as we team up with Dallas Hardware Meetup, michael raspuzzi and Nate Padgett to connect #startups, #investors, #accelerators, and VIP Global Media. If you're interested in innovation and the startup ecosystem in Dallas Fort Worth, join us at Electric Shuffle on Monday, February 12th, 7:30 pm - 9:30 pm for the Innovation Celebration. RSVP here: https://lnkd.in/ezJrMjGi. Also, don't miss your chance to attend 3DEXPERIENCE World 2024 #3DXW24 (Feb 12-14) with a free pass worth $1295. DM me for a free code - register at 3dexperienceworld.com. We'd love to have you and your team join us! Feel free to share this with your network. See you soon in Dallas! Thank you to our partners, Informal and Dell Technologies for Startups! #DallasTX #DallasStartups #Startups #StartupEvents #Innovation #InnovationEcosystem See you soon in Dallas! Thank you to our partners informal and Dell Technologies for Startups! #dallastx #dallasstartups #startups #startupevents #innovation #innovationecosystem John Moore Pat Riley Leigh Christie Suchit Jain Frederic Vacher Micah Estis Green Greentown Labs Los Angeles Cleantech Incubator (LACI) YJ Lin Jillian Friot Rollin Willis Sean Farrell Axel Erraoui Suhaspritipal G Srikrishna Srinivasa Chittur Rachel Skousen Abhijit Bansod Endiatx Torrey Smith Katerina Miklos (Pichugina) Kevin Huang Gl√ºxkind | Techstars '23 Linas Gela≈æanskas Vladimir Popov Ar≈´nas Urb≈°ys Jeremy Hines Mark Tooley Praveen Charles
